document_data.name: Blushcap Mushroom
document_data.mainbody: '''Blushcap mushroom''' was a species of [[fungi]] made famous by many nursery rhymes throughout [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Description:
Blushcaps had red tops, sprinkled with white dots.

They were known to grow in forest detritus of the [[Western Heartlands]] and depths of the [[Underdark]].
